title: The Human Body 2
sentences: schlägt nach dem Sport sehr schnell.
My heart beats very fast after sports.
Ich habe starke Schmerzen im linken
I have strong pain in my left knee.
He bumped his elbow on the door.
The wound on the finger is bleeding a little.
Our skin protects the entire body.
Ich kann meinen kleinen Finger nicht
I cannot move my pinky finger.
ist nach dem großen Essen sehr voll.
My stomach is very full after the big meal.
Sie bitte tief ein und wieder aus.
Please breathe in deeply and out again.
The bone in the arm is unfortunately broken.
The tongue helps us with tasting.
The human brain is very complex.
My lips are often dry in winter.
I bumped my pinky toe on the table.
The joint on the hand hurts.
The child has red cheeks from the cold.
I sweat very much in this heat.
The human skeleton consists of many bones.
Er trainiert jeden Tag einen anderen
He trains a different muscle every day.
Blood transports oxygen through the body.
He makes a fist because he is angry.
ist wegen des Fiebers sehr heiß.
His forehead is very hot because of the fever.
Ich habe ein kleines Muttermal am
I have a small mole on my chin.
dictionary:
das Herz - heart
die Lunge - lung
das Knie - knee
der Ellenbogen - elbow
bluten - to bleed
die Haut - skin
bewegen - to move
der Magen - stomach
atmen - to breathe
der Knochen - bone
die Zunge - tongue
das Gehirn - brain
die Lippe (Pl. die Lippen) - lip
der Zeh - toe
beugen - to bend
das Gelenk - joint
die Wange (Pl. die Wangen) - cheek
die Augenbraue (Pl. die Augenbrauen) - eyebrow
schwitzen - to sweat
das Skelett - skeleton
der Muskel - muscle
das Blut - blood
die Faust - fist
die Stirn - forehead
das Kinn - chin
